====Trivia====
鬱 has, at 29 strokes, the most strokes of any kanji in the jōyō kanji list or {{w|kanji kentei}} level pre-1.<ref>[http://nihonshock.com/2009/10/crazy-kanji-highest-stroke-count/ Crazy kanji: what’s the highest stroke count?], Nihonshock, 2009 Oct 22</ref> The next highest kanji in the jōyō list is [[鑑]], at 23 strokes.
